HELLO: Hey, I'm here to help you find out about Matt!
TWITTER: Let's tweet @Matt so he knows you talking to me. Here's a tweet that's ready to go: http://bit.ly/tweet-mattbot
I LOVE YOU: Awh, shucks! I love you too!
WHAT ARE SOME OF MATTS FAVS: Designing and building products, playing music on his guitars, Beer, and a few martial arts are just a few.
WHAT KIND OF GUITARS DOES HE HAVE: He has a Jackson, a modded Charvel Model 3, a modded Fender Strat and an Epiphone Acoustic. Just don't ask him about his amp!
TELL ME ABOUT HIS AMP: He is the proud original owner of the last tube amp Marshall made, the JCM800
WHAT BEERS DOES HE LIKE: He isn't too picky but isn't a fan of the super hoppy IPAs. He particularly likes Porters and Stouts, Belgians and Sours
WHAT MARTIAL ARTS: He studies a mix of arts as he started with Bruce Lee's Jeet Kune Do when he was 16. Inosanto Kali, Muay Thai, Savate and Silat. He also studies some secret stuff (NO, NOT NINJITSU)
HOW CAN I REACH YOU: You can email him at mbjornson@gmail.com
WHERE IS HE WORKING NOW: He is open to new opportunities
WHAT WAS HIS LAST JOB: He was VP of Product & Growth at LeadPages
WHAT IS HE CURRENTLY WORKING ON: Thats an interesting question... Right now, Matt is working on a bunch of stuff, MattBot and a tool to help companies with product discovery
